body:
`spack create` and `spack checksum` should save the tarballs they download to the downloads cache like `spack fetch` and `spack install` do.

### Rationale

I frequently run `spack checksum` to add new versions of a package. After that, I then run `spack patch` to make sure the patches are still valid, or `spack install` to actually install the package. This causes Spack to download the tarballs twice. We only need to download things once.
title: spack create/checksum: save to downloads cache
